title: react设置title的icon
text: 效果 1、创建一个public文件夹，里面放好图片。 2、在pages里创建一个document.ejs。 3、引入图片。

title: Underscore入门
text: 123Underscore是一个JavaScript工具库，它提供了一整套函数式编程的实用功能。1、包含100多个独立的函数，和jquery相辅相成。2、Collection、Arrays、Functions、Objects、Utility Collection1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071727374757677787980_.each([1,2,3,4],function(val,key){ console.log(key + ':' + val); //输出 "0:1" "1:2" "2:3" "3:4"})_.each({one:1,two:2,three:3},function(val,key){ console.log(key + ':' + val); //输出 "one:1" "two:2" "three:3"})var newMap = _.map(['a','b','c'],function(){ return val + 'map';})console.log(newMap);//输出["amap","bmap","cmap"]var sum = _.reduce([1,2,3],function(meo,num){ return meo + num;},5);console.log(sum);//输出6//设了初始值为5 输出11var even = _.find([1,2,3,4,5,6],function(num){ return num % 2 === 0;})//输出 找到了回调函数为true的就不进行下面的操作了2var evens = _.filter([1,2,3,4,5,6],function(num){ return num % 2 === 0;})console.log(evens);//输出 输出了所有满足条件的[2,4,6]var isSomeBigerThanFive = _.some([1,2,3,4,5,6,7],function(val){ return val > 5;})console.log(isSomeBigerThanFive);//输出 只要里面有满足条件的就返回truetruevar isEveryBigerThanFive = _.every([1,2,3,4,5,6,7],function(val){ return val > 5;})console.log(isEveryBigerThanFive);//输出 只要里面有不满足条件的都返回falsefalse//集合里某一些属性的值提取出来var arr = [{name: 'a', age: 40},{name: 'b', age: 40}];var names = _.pluck(arr,'name');console.log(names);//输出["a","b"]var arr = [{name: 'a', age: 40},{name: 'b', age: 50}];var sorts = _.indexBy(arr, 'age');console.log(sorts);//输出 排序{ 40:{ age: 40, name: "a" }, 50:{ age: 50, name: "b" }}var size = _.size({one:1,two:2,three:3});console.log(size);//输出3 Array12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031console.log(_.compact([1,2,'',null,3,4]));//输出[1,2,3,4]console.log(_.without([1,2,3,4,5]),2,3);//输出[1,4,5]console.log(_.union([1,2,3],[3,4,5]));//输出[1,2,3,4,5]console.log(_intersection([1,2,3],[3,4,5]));//输出[3]console.log(_.difference([1,2,3],[3,4,5]));//输出 把第一个数组跟第二个数组进行比较 有什么不同[1,2]console.log(_.uniq([1,2,3,1,3,4,5]));//输出[1,2,3,4,5]console.log(_.indexOf([1,2,3,4,5],4));//输出3console.log(_.lastIndexOf([1,2,3,4,5]),5);//输出 5最后出现的位置4 Function1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738var func = function(){ return 'hello' + this.name;}func = _.bind(func,{name:'world'})console.log(func());//输出"hello world"var buttonView = { label: 'underscore', onClick: function(){alert('click' + this.label)}, onHover: function(){alert('hover' + this.label)}}_.bindAll(buttonView,'onClick','onHover');var alertFunc = _.once(function(){alert('xx');});alertFunc();alertFunc();alertFunc();//alert 一次var alertFunc = _.after(2,function(){alert('xx');});alertFunc();alertFunc();alertFunc();//alert 两次var alertFunc = _.before(2,function(){alert('xx');});alertFunc();alertFunc();alertFunc();alertFunc();//alert 一次 alert次数不会超过2//throttle 15s 15s就会运行一次$(window).scroll(_.throttle(log,200));//debounce 15s 相当于电梯等待15s 有人进来了又等待15s$(input).keyup(_.debounce(ajax,200)); Object123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960console.log(_.keys({one:1,two:2,three:3}));//输出["one","two","three"]console.log(_.values({one:1,two:2,three:3}));//输出[1,2,3]console.log(_.invert({one:1,two:2,three:3}));//输出{ 1: "one", 2: "two", 3: "three"}console.log(_.extend({name: 'a'},{age:50}));//输出 扩展{ age: 50, name: a}console.log(_.pick({name: 'a',age: 50},'age'));//输出age: 50console.log(_.omit({name: 'a',age: 50, userid: 11},'userid'));//输出{ age: 50, name: "a"}console.log(_.defaults({name:'a'},{name:'b',age:50}));//输出{ age: 50, name: "a"}var obj = {name: 'a'};var objFake = _.clone(obj);console.log(obj);console.log(objFake);//输出//浅复制{ name: "a"}{ name: "a"}var a = {name:'b',age:50};var b = {name:'b',age:50};console.log(a == b);console.log(_.isEqual(a,b));//输出falsetrue

title: js选择图片并且显示出来
text: 12345<script type="text/javascript" src="js/jquery.min.js" ></script><body> <input type="file" id="file_input"> <img src="" class="img" /></body> 12345678910111213<script> $("input[type='file']").change(function(){ var file = this.files[0]; if (window.FileReader) { var reader = new FileReader(); reader.readAsDataURL(file); //监听文件读取结束后事件 reader.onloadend = function (e) { $(".img").attr("src",e.target.result); //e.target.result就是最后的路径地址 }; } });</script>

title: 解决获取出图片地址是乱码
path: 2019/09/19/解决获取出图片地址是乱码/

title: English sentences
text: 博学使人谦逊，无知使人骄傲。1Knowledge makes humble,ignorance makes proud. 你总是这样轻言放弃的话，无论过多久都只会原地踏步。1You're always going to give up, and no matter how long it takes you to get back on track. 每一天都是一年中最好的日子。1Every day is the best day of the year。 要使自己成为别人需要的人。1Make yourself necessary to someone。 做你说过的，说你能做的。1Do what you say,say what you do. 两颗相爱的心之间不需要言语。1No words are neccessary between two loving hearts. 成功者是坚持梦想不放弃的人。1A winner is a dreamer who never gives up. 走到你能看到的最远处，当走到那，将能看得更远。1Go as for as you can see ; when you get there , you'll be able to see farther. 要得到你喜欢的东西，应先学会喜欢你已有的东西。1You will never have what you like until you learn to like what you have. 读好书，就如同和过去世界上最杰出的人谈话。1The reading of all good books is like a conversation with the finest men of past centuries. 把财富转化为知识，没人能夺走它。1If a man empties his purse into his head,no man can take it away from him. 你能经历的最大冒险，就是过你梦想的生活。1The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams. 只有与智者对弈，才能增长智慧。1The only way to get smarter is by playing a smarter opponent. 不要让成功冲昏了头脑，也不要把失败记在心里。1Never let success get to your head and never let failure get to your heart. 有朋自远方来，不亦乐乎！1How happy we are to meet friends from afar. 要公正对待所有的人，但不要轻信所有的人。1Be just to all, but trust not all. 莫忘记，人类情感上最大的需要是感恩。1Don't forget, a person's greatest emotional need is to feel appreciated. 我们有梦想，就要努力去实现；决不放弃，决不退缩。1We dream and we build. We never give up; we never quit. 让我们一起为消除贫困努力，共建更美好的世界。1Let us join hands to stop poverty - all together in dignity. 人生来就是为了出众的，你为什么要老费劲去合群呢？1Why are you trying so hard to fit in when you were born to stand out? 我本可以忍受黑暗，如果我不曾见过太阳。1Had I not seen the sun, I could have borne the shade. 有时候正是那些人们认为的无用之人成就了无人能成之事。1Sometimes it's the people who no one imagines anything of who do the things that no one can imagine. 没有你，一千次的晚安也只是一千次的心伤。1A thousand times good night, a thousand times the worse, to want your light. 如果你只顾着回头看，就永远也无法看到前路有什么。1If you focus on what you left behind, you will never be able to see what lies ahead. 改变世界的灵感总来自于一颗不安分且不安于现状的内心。1Great ideas come from a restless refusal to accept things as they are. 他们或许可以夺走我们的生命，但他们无法抢去我们的自由！1They may take away our lives, but they'll never take our freedom! 我的青春，我的热血都属于你，游走天际，啜饮瀑布。1My youth my youth is yours, trippin'on skies sippin' waterfalls. 如果你想在某件事上有所成就，就必须做出与之相应的牺牲。1If you want to be great at something you have to make inherent sacrifices that come along with that. 生活中任何值得拥有的东西都需要牺牲、耐心，还有努力。1Anything in life worth having would take sacrifice, patience, and be a lot of work. 如果你发现这世上发生了什么错事，可以选择袖手旁观，也可以选择有所作为。1If you see something wrong happening in the world, you can either do nothing, or you can do something. 生存还是毁灭，这是一个值得考虑的问题。1To be or not to be, that is the question. 记住，别相信天注定那套说辞；你的人生要由自己掌握！1You'll remember you don't believe in any of this fate crap. You're in control of your own life. 曾经坠落，才能学会飞翔；走过错路，才能找到正途。1Birds don't just fly, they fall down and get up. Nobady learns without getting it wrong. 胜利，取决于战斗者的意志，而非跟从者的数量。1It is the quality of one's convictions that determines success, not the number of followers. 黎明前总是有些冷的。1It's always chilly at sunrise. 遇难而退，兜兜转转方见万壑千岩；迎难而上，淬炼重生方见光芒万丈。1If you do what is easy, your life will be hard; but if you do what is hard, your life will be easy. 父亲曾告诫我：“多发掘他人身上的闪光点。”1My father gave me some advice: "always try to see the best in people." 不再被规则所束缚，世界由我！随心而行！1No right, no wrong, no rules for me, I'm free! Let it go! Let it go! 不为无益之事，何以遣有涯之生？1What's life without whimsy? 不要只是飞，翱翔吧。1Don't just fly, soar. 创造属于你的美丽。1Create your own beauty. 害怕是正常的，感到害怕才能学会勇敢。1It's okay to be scared. In order to be brave, we got to be a little scared. 勇敢一点、冒些险、犯些错，然后从中吸取教训。1Be brave, take some risks, make some mistakes and then learn from them. 世道不同了，世界一直在进步，唯有强人能立足。1Everything's different and big wheels are turning. You gotta be strong to survive out there. 有些旅途，你必须要一个人走。1There are some journeys you have to go on alone. 向前看吧，这才是你唯一能做的事情1Look forwards, that's the only thing you can control.。 有时候，白纸一张更能呈现无尽可能。1Sometimes empty page presents more possibilities. 生活多彩，选择无限，任你探索！1There's a whole range of colors and options to explore. 你必须在生命的轮回中，找到自己的位置。1You must take your place in the circle of life. 如果你的梦想不值得冒险，那什么值得？1If your dream isn't worth the risk, what is? 成为你想要成为的人、说出你想要说出的话，从来都不会太晚。1It's never too late to be who you wanna be, to say what you wanna say. 理想要源于现实，但高于生活。1The ideal is to be authentic but larger than life. 人需要知道什么时候该捍卫自己。1A man needs to know when to stand up for himself. 没有东西是攻不可破的。1Nothing is indestructible! 屡战屡败，屡败屡战。1Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. 没有激情的人生不完整。1A life without passion is a life half-lived. 每朵乌云背后都有一道阳光。1Every cloud has a silver lining. 享受当下吧！1Enjoy it while it lasts. 去吧，去抓住机会！1Go ahead. Take a chance. 一笑置之，烦恼了之。1If you don't mind, it doesn't matter. 凡事总有第一次。1There is a first time for everything. 我们在生活中做出了选择，就得活在相应的结果之中。1We make choices in life and we choose to live with them. 找到你的爱好，然后想办法做到最好。1Find something you love doing and then find a way to scale it. 让沙漠也开出花吧！1Make deserts bloom! 唱歌本就该唱出你自己的个性。1You're supposed to sing like you. 只有想不到，没有做不到。1A man's station is limited only by his imagination. 分享爱并不代表会失去爱，因为爱是无穷无尽的。1Sharing love is not losing love. Love is infinite. 要做的事，现在就得开始。1If we're gonna do this, we've got to do it now. 目目相对，扣人心弦，我们都是夜空中璀璨的钻石。1Eye to eye, so alive. We're beautiful like diamonds in the sky. 无为之辈无法创造历史。1History was not made by those who did nothing. 凡是过往，皆为序章。1What's past is prologue. 谁的人生在放大镜下没有缺陷？1Whose life, if you look at it under a microscope, doesn't have any flaws? 早起的鸟儿有虫吃。1Early bird gets the worm. 你不能用钱来买忠心。1You couldn't put a price on loyalty. 临渊羡鱼，不如退而结网。1Don't dream it, be it. 每个人都注定会遇到自己的另一半。1The one ought to have the other. 凡美的事物是永恒的喜悦。1A thing of beauty is a joy forever. 跟着你的心走。1You do what's in your heart. 爱邻如爱己。1Love thy neighbor as thyself. 你是夜空中别样的烟火，让世界见证你的光芒吧。1You're a firework. Come on show them what you are worth. 爱无处不在。1Love is everywhere. 人生不是一个站点，而是一段旅程。1Life is a progress and not a station. 让我们携手将世界变得更加美好。1Make the world a good place. 任大雨倾盆，也不曾畏惧。1I'm not afraid when the rain won't stop. 在梦想的指引下努力奋斗，直到梦想成真。1I dream it. I work hard. I grind till I own it. 我们都能做得更好。1We can do better. 每次迈出一小步，日积月累也会成就大事。1Small steps lead to big accomplishments. 继续前行，不要放弃。1Keep going. Don't quit. 真正的勇敢意味着即便身处险境，也勇于匡扶正义。1Courage is daring to do what is right in spite of the weakness of our flesh.
